text: Teralatirus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Teralatirus include: * Teralatirus festivus (Melvill, 1910) * Teralatirus funebris (Preston, 1907) * Teralatirus roboreus (Reeve, 1845) Species brought into synonymy or recombined include: * Teralatirus cayohuesonicus (Sowerby III, 1878) accepted as Dolicholatirus cayohuesonicus (G. B. Sowerby II, 1878) * Teralatirus ernesti (Melvill, 1910) accepted as Teralatirus roboreus (Reeve, 1845) * Teralatirus noumeensis (Crosse, 1870) accepted as Crassicantharus noumeensis (Crosse, 1870) ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae
title: Teralatirus
